arts.ttl: Three talking points from Girona 1-4 Barcelona
arts.sum: The way that Hansi Flick’s side are playing, however, it’s going to take an awfully good team to knock them off their perch. The Polish international is always going to be amongst the goals, but with five games gone in the season, it’s refreshing to see Lamine Yamal, Raphinha, Dani Olmo, Pedri, Jules Kounde and Ferran Torres already on the scoresheet.

arts.ttl: Girona 1-4 Barcelona: Player ratings as Barca cruise to victory in Catalan derby
arts.sum: Lamine Yamal came close to earning the first goal of the game, reaching a loose ball that fell from a Dani Olmo cross. Seven minutes later, he added another goal to his roster after Robert Lewandowski dropped a ball towards the feet of Yamal - who curled a shot in to double Barca's lead.

arts.ttl: Barcelona’s Dani Olmo injured: what is the injury and how long is he out for?
arts.sum: While initial feelings from the club are optimistic, as the tests carried out do not indicate a major injury but rather muscle overload, Olmo is expected to be out of action in the blaugrana shirt for seven to ten days . Olmo is seen as a key player, especially given the amount of injuries that the team have suffered at this early point in the season.

arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal inspires Barcelona while Conor Gallagher opens Atletico account
arts.sum: Julian Alvarez also scored his first Atletico Madrid goal while in Serie A, Inter Milan snatched a dramatic draw.

arts.ttl: Barca storm the Girona castle and put all of Spain on notice
arts.sum: Against Girona, he scored two world class goals, and was certainly the hero on the day. Raphinha, who didn’t score on the day, played the whole game because he is the poster child for the hard, oftentimes thankless work, that Hansi Flick is calling for.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star to miss Monaco clash through injury
arts.sum: A headline member of the midfield ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona is expected to miss the club’s Champions League season debut this coming week. That’s according to Diario AS,…

arts.ttl: Barcelona wonderkid REJECTED Man Utd summer move
arts.sum: Faye’s agent, Andy Bara, has now confirmed that Man Utd wanted to sign his client this summer. The 20-year-old was linked with a Barcelona exit throughout the entire summer transfer window, with Arsenal, Chelsea, Tottenham Hotspur, Bayern Munich, Bayer Leverkusen and Man Utd among the clubs monitoring his situation at Camp Nou.

arts.ttl: Girona boss: Yamal can be as good as Messi
arts.sum: Girona coach Míchel says Lamine Yamal can reach Lionel Messi's level after watching the Barcelona winger take his side apart in Sunday's Catalan derby at Montilivi.

arts.ttl: ‘Barcelona rejected PSG’s world record bid for Lamine Yamal’
arts.sum: Andy Bara, Dani Olmo’s agent, has revealed that FC Barcelona, who sit at the top of LaLiga after beating Girona, rejected a €250 million ($270 million) offer for Lamine Yamal from Paris Saint Germain in what would have been a world-record transfer deal. “I know that Barça rejected a big offer around 250 million euros for Lamine Yamal from PSG ”, Bara told Inkubator podcast.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star jumps to defence of Ferran Torres after Girona red card
arts.sum: A fellow member of the first-team ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona has this evening moved to defend teammate Ferran Torres. This comes after the versatile attacker was sent for…
